content.detailedDescription:
I was stepping outside (front door of house)to check something on my car and immediately saw a large orange light in the black sky. i was stunned! there was a normal star to the left of it about the same height. but this thing was at least 3 times bigger than the star. it was an orange light, and to its far left side we could see a "smoke trail" lingering from the bottom of the ground all the way up to its height. yet this trail was not under the orange light itself, so i don't know if this orange light caused it at some point or not. 

i called my daughter to see this for herself, she ran out, we then both watched it together. initially it was moving toward our house, but when my daughter joined it stopped moving and hovered silently at one spot. we could see 2 or three tiny little orange lights beneath it pulsating, then this also stopped.

we were commenting on the little lights, and while commenting and watching, we could clearly see how the large orange light began shrinking gradually, now taking on the size of the star to its left, and it continued shrinking, now becoming smaller than the star to its left, until it shrank to a single tiny point, whereof it disappeared from view, on the spot! we were commenting, "it must be cloaking itself."

i had the feeling it knew it was being observed, and that it then cloaked itself because it did not want to be seen. 

i did not feel any physical change happening in my body. we were not afraid, just utterly stunned at this blunt display of this vehicle's capabilities! 

we were also commenting on this technology: silently moving, displaying little lights behind/below it, stops moving and hovers, gradually shrinking, then become a tiny light and finally out of view... this is not a conventional craft, obviously.

i don't believe this craft has left because it wasn't traveling when it disappeared itself.

the entire episode lasted about 2-3 minutes, or so, maybe a minute more.

stunning!
content.summary: Orange light w/ tiny lights below it moving silently then stops to hover

content.detailedDescription: Saw it directly above new douglas, for the last four days, three lights, about 150,000 feet in the air, kinda looks like a star, but, it moves around alot. north of the full moon. its still there.... what should i do?
content.summary: Like a boomerang shape

content.detailedDescription: At 9:40 on 7/15/11, i was driving down the ramp at exit two on south 675 and as i was speeding up to blend with the traffic, this object appeared ahead of me, that had red lights at each corner and was banking to to the right at about a 45 degree angle over the horizon, which appeared to about or less than a few miles(maybe 5). my thought process was, that appeared to be the kind of ufo that seen in paris in 2008, though that one had green lights, it appeared the same shape and design. zipping down the highway and getting on to i-75 south, i visually lost it for a moment, because of trees, then out ahead of me, and there were a few cars nearby, i pointed at it, like i was looking at it from behind it suddenly turned to the right and all the red lights at the corners were visible with a white light in the center and it leveled off and banked to the left and i saw a thin band of red lights that appeared to encase the outline around the vehicle and it appeared to be going away from my line of sight, even though i was traveling at almost 80 mph, ( i was excited), this is really cool. i thought for a moment, isn't anyone else seeing what i'm seeing?As i gained control of my destination down 75 south, i caught sight of it again, and it was banking to to the right and leveled off again. the full moon was just appearing in the east out of a cloud bank and with a glimsp of the vehicle it shot to the east, like a bottle rocket , leaving a tail of light. as i exited south 75 at exit 38, a traingular object was just hovering in the sky, near this exit, that had a white light that appeared to be surveying the area and it appeared there for almost a minute. whence i came off the highway, down the ramp and stopped at the ramp, with a few cars/trucks ahead of me at the red light, i got out of my car and looked around, nothing. rats.But what i saw was, not of this world, not man made and i hope we can invite to live with us, because i believe we are not alone. "the truth is out there" and i would love to meet someone from another world, that my god created.
content.summary: Red lights at the corners, white light in the center, at dusk

content.detailedDescription: Ok well agin a star like object appeired wile i was arguine wit my girlfreind .... an then i look up to the sky  looking at the stars then one started to move  slowly an i said shut up look at that ufo  an she looked an i said cool i got u to see one at night time  ... so we looked at it for less that a min an it woobled a bit an then it faded away not that far away from the moon .. so agin some one check out pomona   i promiss a lot of weired stuff in the skys  check it out !!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription: I looked up at the north sky from my yard and seen an unusually bright light in the sky and  mentioned to my wife how bright it was for twilight. then i said i could hear an engine running. then again i thought that it was a motorcycle passing, and after the motorcycle had passed the object was silent as it passed with no noise at all. we watched it for about what seemed to be 2 minutes. it was heading south east at a steady rate until out of sight. it was very bright for twilight. with some shimmering. i have spent many hour of my life watching the sky and have never before seen anything like this. i have seen meteors, space station, comets, northern lights, and satelites. but nothing like this.
content.summary: Silent steady moving, too bright for twilight hour than any thing i have ever seen. some radiant shimmering.

content.detailedDescription: Hi my names mark i live in new jersey...I submit alot of pictures to mufon via the "wired ny web cams" page. lately there hasn't been alot of great activate that i've seen, but tonight that has changed... i have captured ufo's & uso's or ufos that are on the river you can see the water making a circular motion in some shots and the uso's morffing changing shapes, not to mention the large ufos in the sky that appear in all these shots...This page refreshes every 30 seconds. so what i wanna know is how alot of my skeptics are gonna say that there planes and helicopters and boats...  i say b.S. why? i'll tell you..How do planes & helicopters appear over nyc in crazy patterns every 30 seconds??? how do boats change shape & colors every 30 seconds??? well, they dont,there technology is just so advanced that they let these web cams capture there image, but i guess they dont wanna be seen by the naked eye..If that was the case every one who was in ny city tonight looking toward which ever way the nyc web cam #3 is pointing would have seen one hell of a show...Look at my pictures !!!! they are true...They are real... dont be fooled....We are not alone my friends...!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Now this is a ufo !!!!

content.detailedDescription: 7-13-11 12:48pm i was driving west on speedway blvd. i first saw the unidentified craft after the intersection w/ tucson blvd. it was a silver craft in the sky shaped like a thin cigar or missile. it had no wings. at the front it had a stripe of orange metallic color. it didn���t have a ���nose��� like a plane- it was blunt. at the back end it looked either like a piece of silver metal flaring out that was brightly reflecting light or it was bright light flaring out the back. see my sketch craft.Png. it was flying low, going south. i turned south on campbell and just before i reached 6th st i lost track as it descended and the view was blocked by the buildings. it was farther west. it had been flying quite fast and didn/t slow down on the descent. also, it's front didn't tip down. it stayed horizontal. at first i thought it might be headed for the airport, but it didn���t go that far south and was farther west. after looking at a map it might have landed in sentinel peak area.It looked very much like the craft i saw in this area back in may, which i also reported.My reaction was "it is broad daylight and there are a ton of cars around, is anyone else seeing this? it looks like the craft i saw before- but if it were a ufo wouldn't that be odd? there must be an explanation." i later did a search to find out if the university of arizona was doing any aviation research, but no.
content.summary: Silver craft shaped like a thin cigar or missile seen in tucson 7-13-11

content.detailedDescription: The sky was just becoming dark, i went to the window to pull down the shade for the evening.  i saw a bright orange light rise up into the sky from the tree line in the distance.  as i watched it rise up and then level off and begin traveling, i waited for it to become evident to me that it was an airplane.  as i waited for this to happen, another light appeared, then another, then a fourth, and finally a fifth light came into view.  all of them seemed to be floating upward from below the tree line, or traveling vertically, before they moved horizontally.  at no point did the objects appear to be airplanes as they moved across the sky in toward the northwest.  the first light moved rather steadily, the second light caught up with the first light, so was going faster at times.  the third light was going slower, and was surpassed by the fourth light which even appeared to "leapfrog" over the third light.  the fifth light lagged behind the first four by quite a distance and was crossing the landscape near my home after the first light was a faint light in the distance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back steps when i noticed a plane flying slowly. then i realized that it had green lights, not red. i wanted to see what it was so i got a pair of binoculars. i was shocked to see an object that was either very dark gray or black and was sort of saucer like only more angular with the top and bottom portions flattened off rather than rounded.It had one green light that i could see and it was located at the point where the top and bottom parts of the craft met. there were no windows or anything that i could see. it seemed solid. after a few seconds, i lost sight of it so i dropped the binoculars to try to get a fix on it's location, but it was gone. no sign of it anywhere in the sky.When i had it in view in the binoculars, it filled the entire field of vision, but i think it must not have been very large because they were my birdwatching binoculars which are not very powerful. this sighting has left me very unsettled. it was a very disturbing thing to see and i can't stop thinking about it. i have to find out what that thing was. i thought it might have been a remote control toy or something, but i searched the internet and couldn't find one like it. then i searched ufo drone craft and couldn't find anything like it there either. if you have any idea what it might have been, i am very interested in knowing. it will drive me nuts until i have an answer. thank you.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a plane but it had green lights not red. got some binoculars and saw  what i think was a drone craft.

content.detailedDescription: Chilling outside on roof looking up at sky when out of nowhere i see a shape with two or three very bright and distinct lights, the shape and lights moving slowly and horizontally across sky towards my left. i start freaking out and tell my friend to look up at it. he looks, sees it for a moment just as it up and vanishes. it vanished in a blur and was not seen again. very bizzare. i was disturbed the rest of the night.
content.summary: 7 second wonder

content.detailedDescription: I was at my moms friends house and it was about 10pm. i was kicking a soccer ball back and fourth with my friend. i looked down to get the ball and i looked back up and there was 4 fireball looking ufo's with 3 in a triangle and 1 to the bottom left. it was moving real slow towered me. earlier that night we saw 1 real far away. no one in that house had a clue what it was but we all saw it. i was in tears.
content.summary: Close up

content.detailedDescription:
We are vacationing in florida and we've seen the same object in the sky three nights in a row. my wife was the first to notice it and remarked to me that it looks like one of those ufo photos i'd been looking at. as it appeared to our eyesight, it was extremely high up, at least 10-15,000 feet. it was, from our vantage point in new smyrna beach, south-southwest and possibly near or over kennedy space center. our impression was simply an object which was changing colors rapidly, same as our 2 daughters whose description was much more defined: an object which has something solid behind it which was obscured by a large light which changed from green to bright white to a reddish color. it was the camera however that got the best look. keep in mind we're amateur at best and the object was incredibly high up. however the camera managed to catch 2 great shots, one from each night. it remained completely stationary the entire time before dissapprearing behind clouds the entirely gone.
in particular the second photo from july 13th  is amazing when zoomed in! anyhow this experience has made 4 believers more for the world.
content.summary: Photos boomerang-type color changing in florida

content.detailedDescription: We were in our swimming pool and noticed a large organce ball in the northern sky. larger than a star, probably about 4x the size of the north star.  it seemed to be moving south which isn't typical of aircraft in this area and we didn't hear any sound like a plane would make.  i confirmed with all 3 of us in the pool that we were all seeing it and that it didnt' seem like a plane.  we have a large tree in our yard and when the light moved behind the tree out of view i got out of the pool to see what it was doing and it was gone.  we were left wondering what it was and all confirming we did not think it was a plane.  it moved south steadily and the size remained the same.
content.summary: Fireball in the northern sky moving south

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette, and i was gazing at the sky as always.  i was facing the southeast direction, and noticed a triangle object flying silently over the house, coming from directly behind me.  it was pretty low to the ground, and was black with 3 white lights (one in each point of triangle).  it blocked out the stars as it flew over.  i simply watched the object fly slowly & silently over my home and off into the distance.  i must also say that over the past 3 years i have seen many strange lights and/or objects flying over the texas and arizona skies.  as soon as i saw this object, i was amazed because i have heard of other people telling about triangle-shaped craft and have never encountered one.  i wasnt nervous or anxious, just very curious & excited.
content.summary: Triangle object flies directly over house

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to record some fire works in my neighborhood % i caught these to amber balls of light flyin upward into the sky.I don't know what they are.I've seen chinise lanterns before & they don't move like this.
content.summary: Amber balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
A horseshoe shaped pulsating craft that remained stationary above clouds as the iss did a flyby. i was able to capture a screen shot of object.  the object pulsated the entire flyby, until it was out of frame.  

can you get a copy of the video from nasa for day 8 to review??
content.summary: Iss flyby over object

content.detailedDescription: Evening july 12 at about 9;15 pm. sitting on my front porch on a hill looking {east} over the town of tucumcari,nm.Just relaxing after a busy day i was looking at the lights of town etc when i saw a flash of light above me. looking up i saw two lights like the very bright headlights of a car shinning directly toward me for about 15 or so seconds, they then moved ever so slightly to their right to shine away from me and then were just gone. we live almost directly west of our small airport at a distance of 7 or 8 miles. we frequently see and hear small planes going to and from the airport directly above our house at approximately the same altitude the lights appeared to be. my first thought was that the lights were the landing lights of one of these planes, turned on at the incorrect time since they were going away from the airport not toward it. thinking it had gone behind a small cloud i waited for it to emerge and continue west. it did not. note: small planes have only one landing light. i did not understand what i had seen and ask my husband to come out. i told him what i seen. we looked for clouds in the night sky and could see none. there were stars etc, but no clouds and no other lights in the sky.  after thinking about this for two days i am totally mystified and can think of no explanation. any thoughts on this?  (name removed from report) cms flg 07/20/2011 07:11
content.summary: Unidentified lights

content.detailedDescription: I am making this report for a lady who asked to remain anonymous. she called me on the phone and told me that she was on the kutztown bypass on june 4, 2010 when she saw red lights which were too low and did not move. she was on her way to her grandsons graduation in wyomissing at the high school. she said that there was some sort of activity at the local airport involving, i believe she said, aviation history. but she didn't think that the red lights had anything to do with the airport. she left her name but i cannot reveal it because i made a promise to keep her name confidential. she had no further details.

My wife and i were sitting on the front porch of our house.  we do live near an airport (about 15mi. away).  it's quite common to see aircraft flying over our house as they approach the runway.  however, on july 3rd we saw an orange glowing ball of light that was unlike anything we've seen in the area.  when i first saw it, i jokingly said "hey look there's a ufo".  we both continued to watch it expecting it to be an airplane.  but it wasn't.

the object was likely a mile away.  it moved towards our location briefly, then made a turn to the left.  at this point, i told my wife that i don't think it's an airplane (it's not in the direction of the airport).  then, the object faded in/out about five times then disappeared.

is it an aircraft, top-secret flight test, extraterrestrial or something else?  i have no idea.  just reporting what i saw.  i took no photos or video, wish i had.
content.summary: Orange glowing light seen in distance with movement, faded and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were watching the fireworks show here in anacortes, wa on july 4th, 2011 and at approximately 10:00 pm we saw a large orange orb in the sky above us. at first it appeared to just be hovering stationary, but then we saw it move slowly to the north. approximately 20 minutes later we saw another red orb in the sky which separated into two red orbs, one orb dropped a sort distance and then they both slowly moved off toward the northeast. the orbs were visible for several minutes and gradually faded off as they moved away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Reddish orbs seen during fireworks show in anacortes, wa

content.detailedDescription: The event occurred at the end of 2nd shift break, myself and 3 other employees noticed a blue light off to the east. as we observed the blue light we noticed that it was doing some bizarre manuvers such as tight circling and dip down and up for a couple minutes. then the light disapeared in the distance behind a building. several minutes later the light came up from behind the building at a distance and started the same manuvoers but seemed to flicker out. because of our relative proximity to chicago midway airport there was aircraft flying north behind the light at that moment. again the light dipped behind the building. several minutes later the light which was red, was up and coming toward our position. the moon light was illuminating the clouds as it was flying above us. as it flew in a straight line going southwest we could not detect a shape or navigation lights normally associated with aircaft at night. furthermore, with the amount of moon light we could not see a sihlloet of anything other then a orb of light. the light past over heads seeming to go thru the cloulds but them disapearred. there was broken clould cover because a jet that was flying out of midway was passing in and out of clouds a couple minutes later.
content.summary: Orb of light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my roomate, when we notice a really bright super bright orange light in the sky. unlike anything we have ever seen. we see this bright orange like, flicker on off, and shoots up straight into the sky at a extremely fast rate, and disappears. afterward we see another object trailing behind and disappears instantly too.
content.summary: Orange fireball like, flashing, acending towards sky at an extremely fast rate

content.detailedDescription:
several friends and i took a trip out west to northwest montana.

 we all live in florida. we were carrying rifles and handguns in the vehicle for recreational shooting out west. due to this fact we wanted to spend as little time in il. as possible due to their arcane and rediculous laws on weapons.

 we left i-24 and proceeded across wickliffe rd. to get to cairo to cross the river then go northwest.

 i often take route pictures..  it is a bit of a throwback to my days as a lrrp (long range recon patrol) member in the 82nd airborne div.  it is just a habit that i have.. route pictures.

 as we were traveling along the road i snapped some photos of the terrain, road etc.  once again, it is just an old habit i have.

 i spent two weeks in montana, idaho and southern canada..  after returning and reviewing my images with my wife, she pointed out the "ufo" that i had caught along the way, when the picture showed on my computer screen she immediately pointed it out.

i had no idea it was there at the time and only saw it after reviewing the images.

 i have used a photo processing application to rule out anything close, as under magnification the image pixels are quite distinct and clean.. not something close and blurred. looking closely you can see the angle of the shadow of the oncoming vehicle matches that of the "disc".

as for its actions and motions...  i never saw it.

feelings.. none, i was taking a route pic.

i never saw the object to lose sight of it.

 so.. there it is. i will attach a copy of the image and you can tear it apart any way you would like.
content.summary: Picture taken along route shows disc like object in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting outside watching the sunset...We have a beautiful western view of the hills...We stood up to go inside, and he said, "wow lyn, look at that bright light... at first we thought it was a plane, but there was no sound, and we realized that the light was an  orange colour,and surrounding the object, not out in front like a plane... we followed it around our property and watched it float overhead...We both realized that we have never seen anything like it.. we also heard our nearest neighbour yelling to someone to "come outside"...  it made no sound whatsoever and continued at a steady pace until it was out of view...
content.summary: Oval shape,very bright light yellow/orange-/blinking lights on top.
